doc:
Milt Kamen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milt_Kamen 0 Milton Kaiman (March 5, 1921 – February 24, 1977), better known as Milt Kamen, was an American stand-up comic and actor with numerous television credits. As a stand-up comic, Kamen was a favorite of Mel Brooks, Groucho Marx and Woody Allen. According to writer Kliph Nesteroff, Kamen worked as a stand-in for Sid Caesar on Caesar's Hour, inventing bits of business that Caesar claimed for his own. Milton_Kaiman ( March_5_,_1921 – February_24_,_1977 ) , better_known as Milt_Kamen , was an_American_stand-up_comic_and_actor with numerous_television_credits . As a_stand-up_comic_,_Kamen was a_favorite of Mel_Brooks , Groucho_Marx and Woody_Allen . According to writer_Kliph_Nesteroff , Kamen worked as a_stand-in for Sid_Caesar on Caesar 's_Hour , inventing bits of business that_Caesar claimed for his_own .
